subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: DeGrom took a two-hit shutout into the bottom of the eighth inning, when he was undermined by some resistance by the host Atlanta Braves and some shaky defense from his own infield.
snippet: DeGrom took a two-hit shutout into the bottom of the eighth inning, when he was undermined by some resistance by the host Atlanta Braves and some shaky defense from his own infield.
